title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Public Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Public Transportation              Public Transportation       BikeShare Bicycles from Capital Bikeshare can be picked up and returned at stations near the parkway.      Bus and Rail The Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (Metrobus and Metrorail), Arlington Transit, Alexandria's Dash Bus, and Fairfax Connector serve several destinations on the parkway.      Airports Washington Reagan National Airport is located on the George Washington Memorial Parkway, just north of Old Town Alexandria. Baltimore Washington International Airport to the north and Dulles International Airport to the west are both within 50 miles of the parkway.
